sql.isNotEmpty: a.SALE_ORDER_ID in( select distinct d.SALE_ORDER_ID from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL d where d.IS_CANCELED_FLAG=1)

sqlMap.sql: select a.SALE_ORDER_ID, a.SALE_ORDER_NO, a.ORDER_CHANN_NO, a.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, a.ORDER_DATE, a.AREA_NAME, a.PERSON_CON, a.TEL, a.SHIP_POINT_NAME, a.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(a.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, a.BILL_TYPE, (select sum(NVL(b.ORDER_AMOUNT,0)) from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b where b.SALE_ORDER_ID=a.SALE_ORDER_ID and b.DEL_FLAG=0) TOTL_AMOUNT, a.STATE, a.CRE_NAME, a.CREATOR, to_char(a.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME from ERP_SALE_ORDER a
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_SALE_ORDER a

select a.SALE_ORDER_ID, a.SALE_ORDER_NO, a.BILL_TYPE, a.FROM_BILL_ID, a.FROM_BILL_NO, a.ORDER_CHANN_ID, a.ORDER_CHANN_NO, a.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, a.SEND_CHANN_ID, a.SEND_CHANN_NO, a.SEND_CHANN_NAME, a.IS_USE_REBATE, a.RECV_CHANN_ID, a.RECV_CHANN_NO, a.RECV_CHANN_NAME, a.PERSON_CON, a.TEL, a.RECV_ADDR, a.SHIP_POINT_ID, a.SHIP_POINT_NAME, a.STATE, a.REMARK, a.CREATOR, a.CRE_NAME, to_char(a.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, a.UPDATOR, a.UPD_NAME, to_char(a.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, a.AUDIT_ID, a.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(a.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, a.DEPT_ID, a.DEPT_NAME, a.ORG_ID, a.ORG_NAME, a.LEDGER_ID, a.LEDGER_NAME, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ORDER_DATE, a.AREA_ID, a.AREA_NO, a.AREA_NAME, a.RECV_ADDR_NO, (select sum(NVL(b.ORDER_AMOUNT,0)) from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b where b.SALE_ORDER_ID=a.SALE_ORDER_ID) TOTL_AMOUNT from ERP_SALE_ORDER a where SALE_ORDER_ID=#SALE_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, a.DECT_PRICE, a.ORDER_NUM, a.ORDER_AMOUNT, NVL(a.PLANED_NUM,0) PLANED_NUM, NVL(a.SENDED_NUM,0) SENDED_NUM, NVL(a.OLD_PRICE,0) OLD_PRICE, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.IS_CANCELED_FLAG, a.CANCEL_FLAG, a.OLD_ORDER_NUM, b.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL a left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=b.SPCL_TECH_ID and USE_FLAG=#USE_FLAG#

select u.GOODS_ORDER_TRACE_ID, u.GOODS_ORDER_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_ID, u.BILL_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.ACTION_NAME, u.TRACE_URL, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.STATE from DRP_GOODS_ORDER_TRACE u
sqlMap.select:
u.GOODS_ORDER_ID is null and u.SALE_ORDER_ID=#SALE_ORDER_ID#
order by u.DEAL_TIME

select a.SALE_ORDER_NO,a.BILL_TYPE,a.ORDER_CHANN_NO,a.ORDER_CHANN_NAME,decode(a.IS_USE_REBATE,1,'是','否')IS_USE_REBATE,a.RECV_CHANN_NO,a.RECV_CHANN_NAME, a.PERSON_CON,a.TEL,a.SHIP_POINT_NAME,a.RECV_ADDR_NO,b.PRD_NO,b.PRD_NAME,b.PRD_SPEC,b.BRAND,b.STD_UNIT,decode(b.IS_BACKUP_FLAG,1,'是','否')IS_BACKUP_FLAG, decode(b.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG,1,'是','否')IS_NO_STAND_FLAG,d.SPCL_DTL_REMARK SPCL_SPEC_REMARK,decode(b.IS_FREE_FLAG,1,'是','否')IS_FREE_FLAG,b.PRICE,b.DECT_RATE, b.DECT_PRICE,b.ORDER_NUM,b.ORDER_AMOUNT,b.VOLUME,b.REMARK REMARKDTL,c.AREA_NAME,a.CRE_NAME,a.LEDGER_NAME,a.RECV_ADDR,c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME,c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL,a.REMARK, c.AREA_SER_NO,a.STATE,c.AREA_SER_NAME,(case when NVL(b.ORDER_NUM,0)>NVL(b.SENDED_NUM,0) then '待发货' when NVL(b.ORDER_NUM,0)=NVL(b.SENDED_NUM,0) then '已发货' end)STATEDTL, NVL(b.SENDED_NUM,0)SENDED_NUM from ERP_SALE_ORDER a,ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b left join DRP_SPCL_TECH d on b.Spcl_Tech_Id=d.spcl_tech_id
,BASE_CHANN c where a.SALE_ORDER_ID=b.SALE_ORDER_ID and a.order_chann_id=c.chann_id
order by a.SALE_ORDER_NO asc ,b.PRD_NO asc
